Description: Get mug and fill coffeemachine
Turn on faucet and fill sink, pour soap from soap bottle, take sponge and wash dishes
take a knife and slice the apple
get bread slice it and put bread in toaster
get pan and put on stove, get egg from refrigerator, crack egg and flip egg with spatula
Get tomato from refrigerator, boil it, take rest of tomato and throw in the bin, put in bowl and use spoon
Take lettuce from Refridgerator, take pan put in lettuce with water, turn on stove knob and boil
put water in the pot and place on stove, turn on stove knob until boil and turn off when done
Put crack egg in bin
Take all items from the fridge and shelves and put on countertop
slice potato and place on dish put in microwave and turn it on.
pour wine from bottle into a cup
place food in containers and place in refrigerator
pour water into a cup
boil potato in a pot on a stove
place unused apple slices into a bin
place knife, spatula and spoon into a drawer

Task: Pour away coffee in a cup_20_7
Description: pour coffee from coffeemachine into a cup
take pot and pour water from it into a sink
turn off light switch
Go to the coffee table. Pick up the laptop. Turn it on.
Go to the table, get the remote. Walk to the sofa, point it at the TV. Turn it on.

Task: Check the timing on the watch_201_7
Description: Find the watch. Look at the watch to make sure the timing is correct.
Locate the credit card, key chain, remote and tissue box and place those items into the box.
Locate the used tissue box. Place the used tissue box in the bin.

Task: Turn off the table lamp or desk lamp_218_7
Description: Locate desklamp in room. Walk to desklamp. Turn desk lamp off.
Locate cellphone in room. Pick up cellphone. Crack the cellphone.
Locate cellphone in room. Pick up cellphone. Use cellphone.
Locate sofa in room. Pick pillow up off of sofa. Remove it from sofa.

Walk to the dresser. Pick up book. Walk to arm chair. Close laptop. Pick up laptop. Walk to end table. Place laptop on end table. Walk to arm chair. Sit in arm chair. Hold book with cover up. Open book to first page with writing.
